name: .PKPASS File Extension
summary: Learn about .PKPASS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a PKPASS file by sending it to an iPhone, iPad, or Apple Watch that has Apple Wallet installed and then tapping the file. Your iDevice will then allow you to add the PKPASS file to your Apple Wallet, where the file will appear as a pass.
Also, Android users can use Google Wallet or Above Mobile Limited PassWallet to open and manage PKPASS files on their devices.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
